com.ab.listeners.reports

Class ExtentReportLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ab.listeners.reports.ExtentReportLogger

  • public final class ExtentReportLogger
extends java.lang.Object

    The ExtentReportLogger class provides methods to log test step results to an ExtentTest object in the test report. The class uses the ExtentReportManager class to manage ExtentTest objects for each thread.

    See Also:
    ExtentReportManager, ConfigProperties, PropertiesUtil, ScreenShotsUtil, MediaEntityBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void fail(java.lang.String message)
      Logs a failed test step with the specified message to the current ExtentTest object.
      static void fail(java.lang.String message, boolean needScreenShot)
      Logs a failed test step with the specified message and screenshot to the current ExtentTest object.
      static void pass(java.lang.String message)
      Logs a passed test step with the specified message to the current ExtentTest object.
      static void pass(java.lang.String message, boolean needScreenShot)
      Logs a passed test step with the specified message and screenshot to the current ExtentTest object.
      static void skip(java.lang.String message)
      Logs a skipped test step with the specified message to the current ExtentTest object.
      static void skip(java.lang.String message, boolean needScreenShot)
      Logs a skipped test step with the specified message and screenshot to the current ExtentTest object.

        public static void pass(java.lang.String message)
        Logs a passed test step with the specified message to the current ExtentTest object.

      • skip

        public static void skip(java.lang.String message)
        Logs a skipped test step with the specified message to the current ExtentTest object.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to log

      • pass

        public static void pass(java.lang.String message,
                        boolean needScreenShot)
        Logs a passed test step with the specified message and screenshot to the current ExtentTest object. The screenshot is taken using the getBase64Image method of the ScreenShotsUtil class and is added to the report only if the PASSED_STEPS_SCREENSHOTS property is set to "yes" in the configuration properties file.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to log
        needScreenShot - a flag indicating whether a screenshot should be taken

      • fail

        public static void fail(java.lang.String message,
                        boolean needScreenShot)
        Logs a failed test step with the specified message and screenshot to the current ExtentTest object. The screenshot is taken using the getBase64Image method of the ScreenShotsUtil class and is added to the report only if the FAILED_STEPS_SCREENSHOTS property is set to "yes" in the configuration properties file.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to log
        needScreenShot - a flag indicating whether a screenshot should be taken

      • skip

        public static void skip(java.lang.String message,
                        boolean needScreenShot)
        Logs a skipped test step with the specified message and screenshot to the current ExtentTest object. The screenshot is taken using the getBase64Image method of the ScreenShotsUtil class and is added to the report only if the SKIPPED_STEPS_SCREENSHOTS property is set to "yes" in the configuration properties file.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to log
        needScreenShot - a flag indicating whether a screenshot should be taken
